item.title: Integrate R and Python in Rstudio to Power Your Analytical Capability
item.description: If you work with data science, R and Python must be the two programming languages that you use the most. Both R and Python are quite robust languages and either one of them is actually sufficient to carry out the data analysis task. However, instead of considering them as tools that supplement each other, more often you will find people dealing with data claim one language to be better than the other.
